content:
Simple and quick soup recipe: Servings : 4 Duration : 10 mins Sweet corn soup is tasty and healthy. People who like corn ðŸŒ½Â will definitely love this recipe, I used one full sweet corn ðŸŒ½Â also I added carrots and beans to enhance the taste. Half of the sweet corn - I used as it is in soup, when you bite it you taste the sweetness of corn ðŸ˜€ Rest half of the sweet corn - I used to make corn paste It's easy to make , let's go first start with ingredients and next with procedure ðŸ˜€ Ingredients: Sweet Corn ðŸŒ½Â - 1 cup Beans - finely chopped - 1/2 cup Carrot - finely chopped - 1/2 cup Spring onions - chopped - 1/4 cup Sweet corn paste:
  • Take one cup of fresh sweet corn
  • Blend smooth paste in mixer grinder
  • Don't add water
Sweet corn paste - 2 tb sp Corn flour/ corn starch Â - 1/2 tb sp Water - 3 cups Fine / Coasre Pepper powder - 1/2 teaspoon Salt - 1 teaspoon "If required you might add more salt and pepper" Procedure:
  • Add water in frying pan/ deep fry pan
  • Boil water
  • When water started boiling
  • Add finely chopped carrot, beans and sweet corn
  • Mix them well
  • Stir for one minute
  • Add sweet corn paste and mix well
  • Cook for 1 minute
Corn starch paste:
  1. Take corn flour in a small cup
  2. Add water in it and make pouring consistency corn flour paste
  3. Mix it well with spoon without any lumps
  4. Im using corn starch because to form thickness in soup
  • Add Corn starch/ corn flour paste in pan
  • Mix well and cook for 2 minutes
  • Add spring onion,pepper powder and salt
  • Mix them well and stir
  • Cook 2 minutes
  • Sweet corn ðŸŒ½Â vegetable soup is ready ðŸ˜ƒ
  • Serve hot @ evening/winter/rainy season
